content.detailedDescription:
1) i was out with my company doing an annual battalion level exercise called "steel night". 
2) it was dark out and we weren't doing anything but sitting around on our vehicles, and i was looking around talking to my guys, and i see some lights in the distance.
3) i immediately though ufo. when i asked my guys "hey did y'all see that?" they looked at me all crazy and said no what did you see. i told them but they thought i was just tired.
4) it was just hovering there, almost like it was observing our actions on the ground, we just finished doing a live shoot. it hovered there as i watched it, then it went a little to the left and a little to the right, and it just went up in the sky really fast.
5) when i saw it i was honestly shocked. i watched it, and was hoping the others saw it too. once it left i was constantly looking around in the sky to see if i'd see one again.
6) i lost sight of the object once it took off, and i lost the chance to see it again when we left the area about an hour later to continue our maneuvers and attacks.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: U.S. marine sees ufo during training exercise

content.detailedDescription:
No sã© lo que eran , pero se veia muy bonito.
me gustarã­a que alguien pudiera explicarmelo , o me derivaran a quien me diga algo. 
la madrugada del 19 de octubre del 2013 , me levantã© a las 2 am , para ir al lavabo. dormimos con la persiana abierta para q entre algo de luz, y mã¡s q esa noche la luna alumbraba mucho. al volver a la cama, vi por la ventana un arco , tipo parã©ntesis q cierra, de luces muy brillantes y bastante grandes. vivimos en una de las zonas mã¡s altas de barcelona y nuestro piso mira al valle, hacia badalona. alli sobre las montaã±as cercanas a la costa , estaban las luces q se movã­an relativamente lento. formaron  una flecha perfectamente simã©trica, seã±alando hacia abajo. luego despertã© a mi marido , que se quedã³ perplejo con lo que veã­a. las luces se dispersaron , mientras q 4 de ellas se hicieron mã¡s grandes , creo q se acercaron mã¡s aãºn, y formaron un rombo, al tiempo q las otras dispersas se alejaban. le comentã© a mi marido q si agudizaba la vista se veã­a q cada luz grande estaba formada por 3 pequeã±as. el tambiã©n lo comprobã³. acto seguido, comenzaron a alejarse tambiã©n . desde la montaã±a , donde habian seã±alado con una flecha! , salã­an otras luces q junto a las otras se fueron poco a poco.
he visto vã­deos parecidos en internet , y no son farolillos chinos! son mucho mã¡s grandes y ya les comento que cada luz eran 3 mã¡s pequeã±as.
por favor decidme algo que yo me pueda creer y entender. no pienso q en tanta inmensidad sã³lo estemos nosotros.
enviarã© la ãºnica foto ya q el mã³vil no funcionaba bien en ese momento. si se amplia se pueden ver mã¡s luces ascendentes.
content.summary: Luces no identificadas formando figuras en cielo de barcelona. otras despegaban en montaã±a y se iban.

content.detailedDescription: As i was outside smoking a cigarette i was looking up at the stars and noticed a ball of solid orange light overhead and thought to myself a typical satellite, but realized almost instantly satellites don't appear as big as this was or present as a bright orange color. i observed it coming in from the north-east and travel in a straight line path at a consistent speed across the sky toward the south-west. it made no sound, and didn't descend towards the horizen like a plane or satellite would it stayed high in the sky until it vanished from my view. after the incident i also noticed an almost lightened trail like formation following the same path as the object took. i know what stars look like, satalites, meteors and planes this definitley wasn't any of those. i remain puzzled at what i witnessed.
content.summary: Observed a bright orange ball of light move across the sky at high altitude with no sound

content.detailedDescription: On a hot summer day family friends were transporting my brother and i to a man made lake in the hills north east of los angeles. lake as i recall was not that far from the air force base (edwards i believe). about half way into our journey traffic slowed and came to a near halt. i then observed that on a roadway coming into ours from the left was a disk shaped object that was close to having gone over a bank and was blocking one lane of travel. air force ap's and state police were standing about every 30 feet in center of road keeping traffic moving. the vehicle in front of us took a picture. one of the security folks stopped the vehicle and took the camera and removed the film. i then noticed a second disk on the embankment crossed the road (east) 30 yards. to the right of us was a field with some cattle fenced in. about three acres. on the east end of the property was a drive way (about a 100 yards) that gave access to the home. mid way was a third disk blocking access to the home. along this stretch of about a quarter mile were flat bed military trucks, duce & a half's, jeeps, & patrol cars. the disks all had the same characteristics. dark gunmetal gray. approximately 15 feet in diameter with a flat leading edge of 4 to 5 inch's. from the leading edge they tapered equally toward the center for several feet and there a raised edge of lesser height. they then tapper again toward the center for several feet to another raised edge of a lesser height and continuing matching tapper top and bottom. the last section formed a point (cone) on top of approximately 4 foot in diameter. they all set balanced on the center of the bottom to include the one on the hill side. no signs of entryways, windows, or markings. on the return trip they were gone. if a serious inquiry is made i would attempt to provide a better description of sight and draw a pic. anonymity is to protect retirement.
content.summary: Hills ne of la. driving to a man made lake. rounding a bend observed three disks on ground. air force & state police were on scene with equipment to remove.

content.detailedDescription: 11:00pm june 5, 2015. i was parked on the main street of tottenham facing south. i had just left a convenience store. did not notice the object when i arrived. i got back into my jeep, lit a cigarette and as i was starting my engine i noticed a large, bright, pulsating, red/orange fireball-like light very low in the sky in the near distance. it appeared to be just on the edge of the town limits above the treeline. it appeared to be stationary. i watched it to see if it was moving but it was not. i had no idea what the object was. i was thinking chinese lantern at first, but it did not appear to be floating in any direction. i could not take my eyes off of it as i was completely perplexed as to what it could be. after a moment in decended below the treeline, that is when i thought perhaps someone strangely was flying a drone. i could not see if it landed at all. i was about to pull away thinking it was someone playing a prank with a drone. (we are a pretty small town and i have never witnessed a drone in our area) all of a sudden it ascended above the treeline again but was more to the right of its oringinal sighting, then it just stopped. my curiosity could ot take it anymore, so i decided to pursue it. i drove to where it appeared to be hovering. stopped my vehicle, got partway out and looked up at it above me. it began to ascend higher and move southwesterly. i still could not make out any distinct shape. it did not have any sound coming from it. i was pointing and yelling "look", trying to get passing traffic (2 cars) to notice it. it appeared to moved smoothly and on a straight path, as it was climbing higher into the night sky. almost like it knew i was pursuing it. i followed it for about 1/2 a km out of town and lost it in low lying clouds. i drove up the road a bit further to see if i could see it come out again. i parked, got out, and scanned the sky. i gave up after about 5 minutes and drove back to town to tell my friends who had been waiting for me to arrive. i was obviously freaked out and over excitied when i relayed my experience to them. i have been thinking about it for days now, so i decided to report my experience to see if it helps me calm down.
content.summary: Noticed red/orange fireball-like orb at town limits. decended for a moment below the treeline. then ascended and started moving slowly. i pursued it. i got below, it moved away, ascended higher into clouds. no sounds

content.detailedDescription:
On june 4th, 2015 at around 11:45pm i was coming home from an open mic night from the arena tavern off sugarloaf pkwy in suwanee, georgia.  as i was driving into my subdivision on station center boulevard i saw two very large green lights in the sky.  i pulled over to watch it for about 5 minutes and it would change from (2) green lights on one side to (2) read lights on the other side.  i then decided to drive about 400 yards to my home on park pass way.  

as soon as i pulled in the driveway i ran in the house and got by binoculars, fuji finepix s4200 camera with a 24x superwide lens, focal length s4200 : f=4.3mm - 103.2mm, equivalent to 24 - 576mm on a 35 mm camera with my friend janet to come out and watch what i was seeing.  we watched it for another 15 minutes while i tried to look at it with the binoculars and my camera.  the object seemed to be about 8 – 10 miles north of our position.  i had a 103.2mm lens on my camera so a close up picture was very difficult to take holding it by hand, so i decided to take a video.  what you see are the two videos i took.  

the craft seems to be round in shape but only the lights were visible we could not make out an outline of the craft.  the lights moved up and down very fast, much faster than a helicopter or plane, and sometimes just hovered about a mile in the air, we viewed it for about 45 minutes in total.  it finally dipped below the tree line so we decided to drive straight north up peachtree industrial boulevard up to aqualand entrance on, lights ferry road.  we did not see anything while driving up or back.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: While driving i saw two very large green lights in the sky.  i pulled over to watch it for about 5 minutes and it would change from read lights on the other side

content.detailedDescription: While traveling from san juan to miami in route to dallas i saw this object and took pictures of it.
content.summary: Underwater unidentifiued object

content.detailedDescription:
My fiance told me of her ufo contact before she died in 2012 and a friend of my dad told both of its of his ufo encounter  as well.
    sandi,  my fiancé  told me me of her encounter and their conversation with her. the conversation  was that the ufo had come because they had become too advanced amd lady their essence of their self. sandi was interviewed  by neil hardeman of channel 3 of madison, wi. the interview was never aired.
     my dad's friend earl told is of his ufo encounter.  he said the reason they selected him was due to his ear lobes as the ufo's felt earlobes are important. my dad's friend did not report this as he worked for a local police force and was in the national guard at the time. 
     sandi and my dad's friend died quickly of cancer.  sandi in 2012, healthy to stage 4 to death in 2 months.  i did not witness this;  i'm relating whay i was told by sandi amd a friend of my dad (to my dad and myself)
content.summary: Fiance ufo contact and friend of father ufo contact
Several bright spots as stars of rain with defined path

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up around 1:15am. i woke up suddenly and felt a lot of pressure in my head. i heard a sound like a house or car alarm. i looked over at my window and there was a flashing red strobe like light in my window. i'm on the upper level of the house high off the ground. after about 20-30 seconds the light and sound turned off at the same time. i was frozen with fear but when they turned off i jumped up to see what it was. there was nothing. i got back in my bed so scared. after a couple of minutes i heard a smooth loud humming sound. it was right above the house. it didn't fade in the distance or anything, it just stopped. i looked out again and there as nothing. i got in bed and a few minutes later the hum can back for about 10 seconds or so i'm not sure how long. it stopped again and i looked out. nothing again.... it was not a plane or anything. not the same noise. my head was pounding. 

a couple minutes later my daughter ran in my room and said her toe hurt really bad. i checked it and saw nothing. within 10 minutes of the noise leaving, everyone in my house was awake. not for any reason. it's like we all just got up at the same time. my son was eating in the kitchen, daughter awake upset, cat ran up the stairs and i could hear the ferret awake. very odd for all of us to wake up in the middle of the night at the same time. i am terrified to sleep. i always believed in ghosts and spirits but not aliens. i feel stupid for even thinking it. i am really questioning my beliefs now and i'm scared to sleep. i have had weird unknown illnesses for about 2 years now and doctors don't know what's happening to me. i also keep waking up with bruise. could this all be connected? i'm really wondering now. i need someone to help me figure out what this was. thanks
content.summary: It was outside my bedroom window. i am terrified

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Ok this is the first time i've done this online...Obviously there's a lot of close minded people that for whatever reason can not think out of the box so they laugh or act like your the one that's nuts if you come out and say you've seen a ufo so only people who are close to me know what i'm about to divulge...So here it goes ... it was the summer of 1998 i was with my then wife now ex driving back to our house...My wife was driving i was seated in the passenger side and both our sons were in the backseat...My wife n i were talking when i noticed something huge hovering above the road not far from our apartment building...I don't know how it got there when it got there and why it was there...I then told my ex wife look do you see that...She says yes what is that? i didn't answer i was so in awe of what i was witnessing ...I noticed that this thing was huge ...Way bigger than conventional airplanes, jets or anything else...It looked metallic or silverish if that's a word...It had no windows or any form of propulsion it was completely silent and also still...Even our helicopters can't do that...Then within a blink of an eye it almost looked like it disappeard in thin air but the more i've thought about it over the yrs i know now that it was just so damn fast it's impossible to track it with the naked eye...Til this day i get chills n my hair stands up thinking about it...It was not a plane ,jet ,copter, blimp or radio controlled toy this was the real deal and when you see and experience something that mind blowing ...At that moment you know the mystery of are we alone is a myth they are here they're still here and i don't know what we can do...The government can deny ...People can try to laugh an debunk ufos but to people like me we already know the truth which is some other life forms with far greater technology is coming to our planet ...Why only the people privy to that knowledge might know
content.summary: What i saw was disc shaped or oval like metallic in color like silver

content.detailedDescription:
I was 18 at the time,and a group of us meet up every evening below a tree in a park discussing various events.On this evening about 5 oclock we all saw this ball of fire about 3 lampposts high travelling on a dead straight
route silently it just kept going until it disappeared in the distance.
funnily enough we all just shrugged it off unable to think what it could have been.It has bugged me for years.Sure would like a possible explanation.
content.summary: Very bright object very fast
content.locationName: Port of Spain, Port of Spain

content.summary: Fool moon west of 395 california by doyle

content.detailedDescription:
I was on vacation with a friend who works for alaskan airlines. we went downtown vancouver to sight see and was crossing a bridge headed into town on a walk. we stopped on the bridge for a moment to rest and that is when i saw a pulsating object in the sky that was very shiny by eye observation. it was such a clear sky that the flashing is what caught my eye. i am a professional musician, kung fu martial artist, an artist who used to be a structural engineering designer before the economy crash. i was in the navy in the early 90's as a professional trained observer. i was a signalman in the navy. so, i was trained to notice minor details of distant objects. so, at first i knew it was not natural or a familiar aircraft. it was locked completely stationary, totally no travel in elevation nor distance. it rotated on it's own axis and pulsated either shiny glow like a light camera flashes about 3 to 4 per second. unwittingly, i was unaware at the time that the object looked totally different on the camera shots. the light flashes are unapparent on the pictures but you can see the object do this in the short film attached. my camera is older and so the zoom does not function in video settings, so that was the best i could do. through the camera focus lens, i could see the object in more detail that did not translate, of course, in the pictures. it appeared to flash, was a glowing florescent greens and reds. it stayed so steady in the sky that i was able to use the bridges railings to steady the camera so i could observe it longer. it turned perfectly on a central axis at if the object was orbiting exactly on it's poles and not ununiformed like balloons or other object. it was so stationary it seemed locked into the position in the sky above a common point. we stayed there after i shot the pictures and footage for twenty minutes or more. we even ask the local passer-byes if they knew what we were looking at. none knew what we were seeing. i felt invigorated because i love a good mystery. we eventually just walked away out of boredom because the object never left or moved from the area far. i could tell it had a minor flight path and in the twenty minutes we watched it, it stayed the same elevation but just barely drifted horizontally. the drift was totally un-noticeable visually. the drift was like watching the speed of the big hand on a dial clock. 
after a couple of years i was examining the photos with some friends and that is when i noticed the other anomalies in the background similar to the object and in the same relative positions. almost seemed like a group of observing probes or something of the sort.
content.summary: By eye observation, it was a very stationary object that pulsated light in very frequent intervals that did not appear in the shots.

content.detailedDescription:
Reddish amber lights over the city of delavan wi.

my wife went out to the front porch for a smoke. suddenly she called me out and she pointed to the sky asking “what are those.” what we saw initially were three lights reddish amber in color and the first three were followed by three more of the same size and color. 

being late at night it was hard to distinguish the altitude of the reddish amber lights, but i would estimate them being at least a thousand feet high in the sky or more. they ran silently from the direction of the city of elkhorn over the city of delavan in the direction of janesville. 

the lights were very bright and were spaced apart by what appeared to be several hundred feet. they glided across the sky all in the same direction and path. my wife, daughter, grandson, and i watched them fly over our neighborhood and disappeared into the dark sky. the first three lights formed a triangle and followed by three more immediately after. 

the lights made no sound and were definitely not japanese lanterns or flares. there was no smoke trail, and the lights did not flicker like a flame. we saw no strobing red or other color lights on the objects. i did contact the local police department to report them. i did not have my camera with me.
content.summary: Six objects observed by family at home

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to get fresh air around 11 25pm ish to look at stars and fresh air saw a star.... i thought was a star but turned off then on... no bs. stayed by tree line moved some then back then off then on multiple times for 35 to 40 mins i took a pic tried looking with binoculars and looked funny don't think was a,star no planes in area just weird but calming so didn't feel scared so went inside to go to bed thought i would let you all know
content.summary: Thought a,star but light going in and out then stayed above tree line then light got brighter stayed then off then on moved

content.detailedDescription: Disk came over hill from east slow then stoped bright orange as big as a football stadium then shot south fast    . my causent said that a black man said he was taken abord from smithport.   second one was1962 by pittsburg pa  on guard at a nike missle base small disk bright.  ihe ifc had joel and i come to see things on the radar scope. a lot and they were fast they said there not from here and that they have ben to all all are missle bases.  last one was by interstate 80 by richmond california at night and was small and shot away
content.summary: Very larg  disk coming over mountion glowing bright orange from east then stoped for about 20 sec then shot fast south by hy 1

content.detailedDescription:
Montreal, québec, canada.  we were in the spa looking at the sky and my wife saw a bright light at 320 degree nw.  we taught that was the spacial station above.
after, we went at the front of the house for watering plants (at 10 pm) june 5th 2015.
my wife told me:  look at that, it's still there.
i went to bring my binocular and my wife took pictures of the object obove.
we use binocular (astonony one) 15 x 80 lenses.  
we saw the object more precisely.  round shape, with multiples white lights inside.  like a spider nest.
we imagined that was a super nova.  but last night, no more lights in the sky.  
planes passed between the object and us. 
we observe the object one hour and a half.  we taught tomorrow we will see it again if it was realy a super nova.  yesterday night, nothing in the sky.
we felt that was very special sight.  nothing ever seen before.  we took astonomy cours in the past with the planétarium of montréal.
i am a doctor in medecin and my wife is a nurse.
content.summary: Big round light with multiple lignts inside when using magnifier 15 x 80w

content.detailedDescription:
This is in reference to case# 66097 and case # 66139, which was an extenuation. this is further information regarding this case. as i have stated previously, it seems to be an ongoing issue and it appears that all i need to do is step outside at the hour i go to work with a camera and record while i work as best i can.
i work a newspaper route in the county area, two routes i work back to back. i have always noticed strange things, and suspected close encounters and wanted to prove it. i'm not new to close encounters, going way back. one of the areas i deliver to is actually caddy corner to the neighborhood i grew up in, in the early to late 90's where and when i experienced a multitude of strange occurrences, or close encounters.
so i've been making video of my route every day because of what i found on the video from last weekend, on 5-31-2015. what i've found is that nearly every video has at least one object or entity. i have discovered that i drive slowly and with my windows down, that if i have the camera pointed back over my shoulder they hover up to my window and appear to whisper and look into my car over my shoulder. i have observed that there are a large number of small objects which seem like orbs or an et version of a drone flying around street lamps or hovering and emitting light, going into and ejecting from larger craft. i feel like they're a version of r2-d2 if that makes sense. i want to explain them away to myself as drops of water on the windshield but i just can't accept that since there is often no drops of water on the windshield and when there are, light plays differently than this.
i have noticed a lot of lights which follow my car which turn on and are not stationary or they aren't there the next night.
i follow the same route every night, and there is some construction.
i've noticed a lot of them tend to hover around on a version of a segway scooter, i actually might have a portion on tape of that.
near the cemetery, there are a lot of times where i will see lights in the cemetery, or what might look like heat lighting, and police will tend to patrol there or go near to try to observe.
what really gets me is the stuff i don't notice until i watch it on the video when i get home, like when i point the camera up while i drive and see a ghostly vaporous object which appears and moves around then disappears, and i have no explanation for this. i often do not feel like i am truly alone although i tend to think i am the only one of my kind anyway.
it's a cheap camcorder, with good low light, not ir, it's not a flir cam, it's a 100 samsung. it doesn't really pick up anything in the night sky unless it's a full moon. stars don't show up because of the optics, it's not a pro camera with premium optics, lets say. i record the sky, and it comes back that there are lights which move in unexplainable ways.
earlier, i was driving and i noticed a metallic box shaped object i did not see with my eyes or notice until i got home. it appeared to hover and raise slightly, and there was a window and a being looking out, and the light inside appeared to be on. i sometimes catch a face or two from the sunroof if my camera looks up and down, even if just for a split second. i notice that the lights on the outside of the craft might light up in the same spectrum as the street lamps to blend in.
a multitude of evp's, what seem like whispers. they appear to know and understand my name, and can communicate in english. i often hear strange animal noises which seem to be speaking english from the darkness and out of my periphery, which sound like a screeching parrot or a wild raccoon or other animal. i sometimes encounter people in mundane situations like purchasing beverages from a gas station who seem to think i am talking to them, like earlier tonight, when two other people insisted that i repeat to them what i just said. i didn't say anything. it's as if they put on a costume and go about as us in regular everyday situations. i even caught a still of the gate guard from the neighborhood, a polite man, who appeared to have half of his face morph into a grey alien face, very clearly.
all of this, not frightened of this. i report to work, i make a paycheck. this being an ongoing thing. at this rate, i'm going to run out of hard drive space to contain the evidence i'm gathering just by going about my daily routine with an inexpensive camcorder. i'm going to have to buy another external hard drive because i could end up with terabytes of data, pictures, audio, hd video. it's every night.
i have a number of pictures and videos, i would gladly share them all with investigators in an effort to gain some better understanding of what's going on in the community and in my life.
and i'm going to continue to record every day something new, and see about what i might catch in the footage. today i'm just going to upload a little bit of it, what i have from earlier today and from earlier in the week to illustrate that they come up to my car window silently hovering and whisper. in the video it sounds like an alien language, in my head sounds like perfect english, don't know why. was told the guy from last week who reached in to my car was reported as a prowler.
i never felt comfortable to express i heard or saw things, because of what might happen to someone who doesn't have explicit evidence who says they hear or see strange things, and official policy to remove people and check them for internal wiring problems.
the video proves to me at least that what i'm experiencing is real, and that there's more that i don't see while i am focusing on work or driving as i go, and from the simple fact that the digital cmos sensor in the camera is programmed to refresh at a different rate than my naked eye, which presents a technical problem for any sort of disguising of an object or being that they apparently haven't straightened out or maybe don't want to.
and it's every night. i could go out and record a little from every night, there would be something, i predict. something new, or more of the same.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Continued observations of objects, entities, and evp on route

content.detailedDescription: We were on our way back to texas from a dive job in louisiana on i10 i saw a helicopter hovering over an overpass about 30 ft high  about the time we got to the overpass the helicopter went in the same direction we were going but it didnt seem to accelerate it just went a faster speed than us its really hard to explain it was at a stand still then was going faster than us but didnt seem to have to pick up speed it was just at a different and faster speed. it was out of sight in about 10 seconds then we saw it north of us about 5 miles in the distance when we stoped at the gas station i asked im i the only one that saw that and got an overwhelming no from everyone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: We were coming back to tx from work in la i saw what i thought was a helicopter above an overpass then it went west flight was not normal very hard to explain how it moved then saw it several miles away to the north other people saw it also its

content.detailedDescription:
I am deeply confused if i was dreaming or what the hell is going on. i went to bed this thursday night at around 4:00 am. i don't know exactly when, but i woke up with a feeling like someone was watching me, and feeling really low power transformer feeling in my brain and body, like one of those shock prank buzzers, but the vibrations only, not a sound. 
i felt really scared like my house was being broken into, which was what i though so my first thought was to get my sword, and walk toward to door, but i could't move out of my position, and started hearing tones and voices telling me i was safe, and to relax. 
obviously, i thought this was my mind telling myself to chill out, and think carefully if someone was in my house, and suddenly, i saw 2 small weird looking things standing on the side of my bed next to me with no emotions, but they seemed like they were members of my family, or someone i met in a past life or something. then i realized immediately, these were not people. i thought again that i was dreaming, or i was having a night terror or a nightmare i was going to wake up from, and i realized that this was too physically real to be a dream. then i felt myself saying, let's go, we're going now", and to my shock, my body lifted from my bed, and went thru my wall of my bedroom in a bright light. up toward a little star like light above my yard, and then i remember feeling a strong overwhelming fainting feeling and went to sleep. i woke up and i was laying on an area next to the same creature, and he said "its okay, you'll be alright" "don't worry" but he said it in my voice, which i clearly remember feeling extreme fear, and it was not helping me feel safe at all. i remember crying like a child, but it was strange because it felt happy, as if i was meeting god in heaven. it had a shiny like…mesh/spandex suit with a triangle and circles insignia on it, and i asked what are you doing to me why am i here. no answer, then i felt the sensation that i had to orgasm suddenly, and i remember feeling like a love for this thing, like it wanted me to enjoy the stimulating feeling, and it said it was making children for the future of earth. it said it's name was zeta, and it was hard to make out from the bright light above us, which felt like it was brighter than the sun. i remember looking sideways, and seeing another small brown grey man, and they had really long hands, and fingers. kind of like a geckos fingers look, and they were talking to each other without making noise, but i could still hear them in my head talking, like a person does when they have conversations with themselves about their plans for a day. then i felt an overwhelming tired feeling and that was the last thing i remember. when i woke up, i had a burning feeling pain on my ankle and a little circle of skin was cut 4 layers down into my shin, about the size of a pin head. since then, i have felt like i have been hearing little beeps and feeling those low vibration buzzers in my head when i wake up, and i feel physically sick am i going crazy? i am reluctant to tell anyone, because i don't want to be labeled as a crazy tin foil hat guy, but i know what i saw, and it was defiantly what the typical alien looks like i'm assuming. it was absolutely terrifying, and after reading online about other people's encounter stories, i am convinced that i have been taken by aliens.. how does someone rationalize this??? is there an alternate explanation, or should i seek a psychiatrist? do i report this to the police?
content.summary: I woke up and felt stuck in my bed like i was paralyzed, felt a transformer sound in my brain, and got pulled lifted off my bed.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of june 6th, 2015 at 9:05pm est i stepped onto my fire escape to have a cigarette.  i noticed what i thought was a roman candle ascending from behind the trees and buildings to the nne.  when the orb did not burst, or burn out, but instead slowed and seemed to hover for a few seconds i became curious. i pulled out my cellphone and started filming.  the orb seemed to continue hovering for a few seconds then started moving from nne to sw and seemed to accelerate as time progressed. the orb faded out after about a minute and 50 seconds from when i first saw it.
content.summary: Orb appeared to rise from behind trees, hovered, then moved from nnw to sw

content.detailedDescription: I'm a canadian truck driver and was heading north on i-5 on june 6 th 2015 near the town of ferndale washington when i notice 6 to 8 round orange lights traveling in a dual  v style shape heading south towards bellingham washington.  they were traveling at a constant speed with equal distance between them about 800 to 900 feet above ground. the speed they were traveling was most likely around 60 to 80 mph. the objects were a solid light. didn t hear any sound but that was most likely because i was in my truck.   lost sight of them as i was heading north and they were heading south.. [item moved/cms/nd]
content.summary: 6 to 8 glowing orange lights traveling south

content.detailedDescription: we were outside watching shooting stars and we saw a light that looked like a star it blinked randomly it did not have a straight flight path when we were looking at it there were several satellites that began to show up in the area right around the blinking light it disappeared for a few minutes and then came back to the same area we tried to communicate with it by using the flash from our camera it would blink and then we would flash the camera and it would blink again we were not scared of the light or intimidated by it we actually wanted to see it again and we're hoping to make contact with it
content.summary: Star like light app see appeared in the sky and blinked randomly for about 30 minutes. several satellites flew by at the same time as the light.

content.detailedDescription:
Time :- 11:43 am may 23rd 
i was waiting in a parking lot in my vehicle
the object caught my attention as it came from my right 
at first i thought it was a/some foil balloons as it was "flashing"
sometimes 1 light sometimes 3, as bright as weld flashes when someone is welding 
i watched as it came from the right, across my windsheild sightline to the left window.
the object seemed to be " tumbling" across the sky
the day was cloudless, clear and sunny.
the ojbect then stopped, still tumbling and stayed there for 2-3 minutes
then it proceeded to go back in the opposite direction which caused me to get out the vehicle and see if i could get a better view.
i watched as the object quickly came back from left to right.
stopped for a while above me.
at this point i remebered i had my camera in the vehicle (canon 6d with 70-200 l lens with 1.4 extender )

i took about 45 shots in rapid bursts before i checked what they came out like, at this point i realised i had it on wrong setting.
while taking the pictures the object was moving to the right.

i adjusted the camera and started shooting again.
the object at this point is again on my right side 
i observed the object moving up/ down/ back to the left/ then stop
it seemed to blur/ flash / tumble as it was travelling and hovering.

i got about 25 pictures of varying quality/ 5 showing definte shape of the object but not fully detailed due to the distance.

i observed the object for about 20-25 minutes in the end it just vanished as i watched it.

this was a very exciting event to observe and i'm happy with the pictures i got.

i'm not sure how to upload the pictures to you as it just pastes a link to my computer directry where my pictures are.
i would be happy to email the pictures if someone wants to email me
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright tumbling shape chaging with lots of changes in direction

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was at work and it was raining, so i went to make sure my su roof was closed. i was talking to my co-worker and said hey check out the colors from the sunset. at that point he said whats that black dot. it took me about a minute to see what he was seeing. i said i had no clue, i pulled out my phone to see if i could zoom in on the object and took a video of this object. when i first seen the object zoomed in, i was confused because of the shape. it was stationary and didnt move then it began to hover while moving north and began to fall pretty fast.  i questioned if it were balloons or a drone, but the movement of the object didnt seem possible.No sound was made from the object, it seemed to morph and change shape. it was exciting to see, it fell below the tree lines and i have no idea if it landed.
content.summary: Morphing object that slowly hovered from north west to north then decended below tree lines

content.detailedDescription:
I was  filming the moonrise on my balcony- and noticed the eastbound 737

on approach  to mascot kfs, (it was also lower)and i  did record that  and  the  lights it 

emitted, typical  airliner  pattern, i recorded for about a minute,and 

went  back inside as it was quite cold.
 
  what i  did  notice  on  playback was a bright-dull orange  orb  that 

appeared at the top(12 o'clock  position) at the 0.05 sec time index, i 

haven't the  necessary  equipment to view this frame  by  frame but will  

gladly pass it on to  you.


  regards
[name removed/cms/jpg]
content.summary: Did  not  notice at the  time only on playback- was  recording  moonrise

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were at home walking up our driveway toward our house.
wife looked up over fence at sky and said look at that, i looked up to see an extremely large array of lights structured like no array i have ever seen on an aircraft. i spent 24+ years in the usaf in aircraft maintenance.
at first i thought it must a group of helicopters in perfect formation, i also instantly determined it could not be choppers, choppers don't move anywhere near this fast and could not keep such perfect symmetry, this was no aircraft.It moved in complete silence, disappered behind trees and was gone when we ran around the other side.
the object supporting the lights was huge and moved across the part of the horizon we could see at incredible speed,it appeared to blot out the sky/stars as it moved from west to east toward mt rainer.
content.summary: My wife said

content.detailedDescription: That was day dushhera festival we were in the ground suddenly a light appeared above statues of ravan. i think it was a drone used for security purposes, but when it disappeared i was frightened. after some 15 minutes it appears again in another direction. when statue of ravan burnt it was not there.
content.summary: Flying above statue.
